meta.title: Comprehensive BPHS Divisional Chart Rules v1.0
meta.basis: Bṛhat Parāśara Horā Śāstra Ch. 6-7 (R. Santhanam, Vol. I)

source_reference.exact_quote: The Navamsa chart shows the strength of planets and their effects on marriage, dharma, and spiritual development.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Navamsa lagna and planetary positions indicate marital harmony and spiritual progress

rules.summary: Navamsa lagna strength determines marital happiness, spiritual development, and dharmic conduct based on lagna lord's dignity and aspects received

impact.positive_manifestation: Harmonious marriage, spiritual growth, dharmic conduct, good fortune after marriage, and strong moral character when navamsa lagna is strong
impact.negative_manifestation: Marital discord, spiritual obstacles, moral challenges, and post-marriage difficulties when navamsa lagna is afflicted
impact.neutral_manifestation: Average marital life with moderate spiritual progress and mixed dharmic results

strength_variations.navamsa_lagna_lord_exalted: Exceptional marital bliss and spiritual advancement
strength_variations.navamsa_lagna_lord_own: Good marriage compatibility and steady spiritual growth
strength_variations.benefic_aspects_to_navamsa_lagna: Divine blessings in marriage and spirituality

primary_actions: Strengthen navamsa lagna lord through appropriate remedies
Match navamsa charts before marriage for compatibility
Practice spiritual disciplines to enhance dharmic strength
Seek blessings from elders and spiritual teachers
Perform marriage ceremonies during auspicious navamsa periods

if_weak: Delay marriage until remedies take effect

source_reference.exact_quote: Venus placement in Navamsa determines the nature of spouse, marital happiness, and relationship harmony.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Venus in navamsa reveals spouse characteristics and marital fulfillment

rules.summary: Venus position in Navamsa chart reveals spouse nature, marital happiness, and relationship dynamics based on its dignity, house placement, and aspects

impact.positive_manifestation: Beautiful and virtuous spouse, harmonious marriage, material comforts through partnership, and artistic/cultural interests when Venus is well-placed in navamsa
impact.negative_manifestation: Spouse-related challenges, marital discord, financial issues through partnership, and relationship instability when Venus is afflicted in navamsa

strength_variations.venus_exalted_navamsa: Exceptionally beautiful and cultured spouse with great marital happiness
strength_variations.venus_own_navamsa: Good spouse with stable marriage and material comforts
strength_variations.venus_debilitated_navamsa: Spouse-related challenges requiring patience and understanding
strength_variations.venus_7th_navamsa: Direct impact on marriage and partnership harmony
strength_variations.venus_12th_navamsa: Foreign spouse or marriage-related expenses and challenges

primary_actions: Strengthen Venus through appropriate gemstones and mantras
Cultivate artistic and cultural interests for marital harmony
Practice patience and understanding in relationships
Seek partners with compatible Venus placements
Perform Venus-related remedies before marriage

source_reference.exact_quote: Jupiter in Navamsa indicates dharmic conduct, spiritual wisdom, and divine blessings in married life.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Jupiter's navamsa position shows spiritual development and dharmic strength

rules.summary: Jupiter's position in Navamsa chart indicates dharmic conduct, spiritual wisdom, divine blessings, and the couple's joint spiritual evolution

impact.positive_manifestation: Strong dharmic conduct, spiritual wisdom, divine protection, children's blessings, and joint spiritual growth when Jupiter is well-placed
impact.negative_manifestation: Dharmic challenges, spiritual obstacles, lack of divine blessings, and children-related issues when Jupiter is afflicted

primary_actions: Practice dharmic conduct in all relationships
Engage in joint spiritual activities with spouse
Seek blessings from spiritual teachers and elders
Perform charitable activities together
Study spiritual texts and philosophy as a couple

source_reference.exact_quote: Dasamsa chart reveals career, profession, and achievements in worldly matters based on planetary positions.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Dasamsa lagna and 10th house analysis for career guidance

rules.summary: Dasamsa lagna and 10th house analysis reveals career direction, professional success potential, and worldly achievements based on planetary strengths

impact.positive_manifestation: Clear career direction, professional success, recognition in chosen field, and steady career growth when dasamsa factors are strong
impact.negative_manifestation: Career confusion, professional obstacles, frequent job changes, and delayed success when dasamsa factors are weak

primary_actions: Choose career aligned with dasamsa lagna lord's nature
Strengthen dasamsa 10th lord through appropriate remedies
Time career moves during favorable dasamsa periods
Develop skills indicated by strong planets in dasamsa
Seek mentorship in areas shown by dasamsa benefics

source_reference.exact_quote: Sun's position in Dasamsa indicates government service, authority positions, and leadership roles in career.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Sun in dasamsa shows authority and government-related career potential

rules.summary: Sun's placement in Dasamsa chart indicates potential for government service, authority positions, leadership roles, and public recognition in career

impact.positive_manifestation: Government positions, leadership roles, public authority, and recognition from superiors when Sun is strong in dasamsa
impact.negative_manifestation: Authority conflicts, government troubles, ego clashes with superiors when Sun is afflicted in dasamsa

primary_actions: Pursue government service or leadership positions
Develop leadership and administrative skills
Maintain ethical conduct in authority roles
Seek positions requiring public interaction
Build reputation through consistent performance

source_reference.exact_quote: Mars in Dasamsa indicates engineering, military, police, surgery, and technical professions requiring courage and skill.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Mars in dasamsa shows technical and courage-based career aptitudes

rules.summary: Mars placement in Dasamsa indicates aptitude for engineering, military, police, surgery, sports, and technical fields requiring courage and precision

impact.positive_manifestation: Success in technical fields, military honors, surgical skills, sports achievements, and engineering excellence when Mars is strong
impact.negative_manifestation: Workplace conflicts, accident risks, aggressive behavior, and technical failures when Mars is afflicted

primary_actions: Pursue engineering, military, or technical careers
Develop physical fitness and technical skills
Practice safety protocols in high-risk professions
Channel competitive spirit constructively
Build expertise in specialized technical areas

source_reference.exact_quote: Hora chart with Sun and Moon horas indicates wealth potential and financial prosperity.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Hora analysis for wealth and financial success

rules.summary: Hora chart analysis reveals wealth potential, financial prosperity, and money-making abilities based on Sun and Moon hora distributions

impact.positive_manifestation: Strong wealth potential, financial prosperity, and money-making abilities when benefics are well-placed in hora
impact.negative_manifestation: Financial struggles, wealth obstacles, and money-related challenges when malefics dominate hora

primary_actions: Focus on wealth-building during favorable hora periods
Strengthen planets in beneficial hora positions
Time financial decisions based on hora analysis
Develop multiple income streams
Practice financial discipline and planning

source_reference.exact_quote: Drekkana chart indicates siblings, courage, and short journeys based on planetary positions.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Drekkana analysis for sibling relationships and courage

rules.summary: Drekkana chart reveals sibling relationships, courage levels, short journey outcomes, and communication abilities

impact.positive_manifestation: Good sibling relationships, courage in challenges, successful short journeys, and effective communication
impact.negative_manifestation: Sibling conflicts, lack of courage, travel problems, and communication difficulties

primary_actions: Strengthen relationships with siblings
Develop courage through gradual challenges
Plan short journeys during favorable periods
Improve communication skills
Support siblings in their endeavors

source_reference.exact_quote: Saptamsa chart indicates children, progeny, and creative potential based on planetary strengths.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Saptamsa analysis for children and creativity

rules.summary: Saptamsa chart reveals children potential, progeny blessings, creative abilities, and reproductive health based on planetary positions

impact.positive_manifestation: Blessed with children, creative talents, good reproductive health, and progeny happiness
impact.negative_manifestation: Children-related challenges, creative blocks, reproductive issues, and progeny concerns

primary_actions: Strengthen 5th house factors for children
Develop creative talents and abilities
Maintain reproductive health through proper care
Practice patience regarding children timing
Engage in creative and artistic pursuits
